list.name: Default
list.comment: Adds ability to add environment variables to allow switching the backend service between testing, local and production

task.summary: Default task

Adds mock backend to mimick the iTunes service
Adds ability to add environment variables to allow switching the backend service between testing, local and production
Can use SASS The app will auto compile SASS files when they change

Update the main app to reflect the music player

Start abstracting audio out of media player into it's own manager
